text:
Kaching AB | Stockholm, Sweden | 3 Roles | Full-time, Onsite preferably

We are Stockholm-based startup founded in 2016 and we're building cloud infrastructure and mobile apps to support the next wave of brick-and-mortar and online retail innovations (self-checkout, mobile POS, RFID applications, machine learning, etc). We're looking for cloud engineers, backend, and Web developers.

Career Page: https://www.indeedjobs.com/kaching-ab/

* Cloud Engineer: Experienced cloud engineer with razor sharp knowledge about cloud architecture.

Keywords: AWS, Cloud Formation, Cloud Front, Cloud Watch, Elastic Compute Cloud, Lambda, Route 53, API gateway, pm2, Apache Kafka, Networking, Security, GDPR Link: https://www.indeedjobs.com/kaching-ab/jobs/3db2068f08a445282...

* Backend Developer: Experienced backend developer with strong interest in system design.

Keywords: NodeJS, TypeScript, pm2, CQRS, Kafka, Event Sourcing, Micro Services Link: https://www.indeedjobs.com/kaching-ab/jobs/7828451b61553d4e1...

* Lead Web Developer: Experienced Web developer to take ownership and bring our web platform to the next level.

Keywords: JavaScript, client-side frameworks such as VueJs, ReactJS, webpack, CSS, npm, TypeScript Link: https://www.indeedjobs.com/kaching-ab/jobs/3867a157e5249d648...
